title: Ahri is overpowered! Please nerf!
body: Her damage is disgusting. She's too mobile. You can't catch her if you don't put CC on her before she notices you. She's too sexualised. She's that the ideal champion for every virgin boy out there.

replies.body: change your name, maybe she won't be op then

LOL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
i down voted before i even read it Hahahaha

Alot of champions are oversexiualised because of what you look at in your spare time lol.
